abstract_ssm: The papers relate to property owned by Timothy Cortelyou in Brooklyn and New Utrecht. Folder 1 includes 2 handwritten receipts for advertisements placed by Cortelyou. Folder 2 contains printed facsimiles of documents pertaining land in New Utrecht inherited by Cortelyou from his father, Jaques Cortelyou, upon his death.
title_ssm: Long Island star (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
